name: HomologicalComplex.eq_liftCycles_homologyπ_up_to_refinements
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
ι : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_3, u_1} C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Abelian C
c : ComplexShape ι
K : HomologicalComplex C c
A : C
i : ι
γ : Quiver.Hom A (K.homology i)
j : ι
hj : Eq (c.next i) j
⊢ Exists fun A' => Exists fun π => Exists fun x => Exists fun z => Exists fun hz => Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp π γ) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (K.liftCycles z j hj hz) (K.homologyπ i))
decl:
lemma eq_liftCycles_homologyπ_up_to_refinements {A : C} {i : ι} (γ : A ⟶ K.homology i)
    (j : ι) (hj : c.next i = j) :
    ∃ (A' : C) (π : A' ⟶ A) (_ : Epi π) (z : A' ⟶ K.X i) (hz : z ≫ K.d i j = 0),
      π ≫ γ = K.liftCycles z j hj hz ≫ K.homologyπ i := by
  subst hj
  exact (K.sc i).eq_liftCycles_homologyπ_up_to_refinements γ
